name: Monarch Casino & Resort, Inc.
description: Monarch Casino & Resort, Inc. is a leading gaming and entertainment company that operates the Monarch Casino Resort Spa in Black Hawk, Colorado, and the Atlantis Casino Resort Spa in Reno, Nevada. Established in 1993, Monarch has built a reputation for providing exceptional customer service and a premier gaming experience. The company offers a diverse array of gaming options, including slot machines, table games, and poker, alongside a range of dining and entertainment choices that cater to a wide audience. In recent years, Monarch has invested heavily in expanding and enhancing its properties, including the completion of a significant renovation at the Monarch Casino in Black Hawk, which has added a state-of-the-art hotel and spa facilities. With a focus on sustainable growth and community engagement, Monarch aims to create memorable experiences for its guests while contributing positively to the local economy. The company is committed to responsible gaming practices and actively supports various philanthropic initiatives in the regions it operates.
